content: 1st st to join 26 round 14 chain 2 *skip 1 st double_crochet in next st double_crochet in skip st* around slip_stitch into 1st st to join 26 round 15 chain 2 double_crochet around slip_stitch into 1st st to join 26 for longer mitts with more finger coverage repeat rounds 14 and 15 until desired length fasten_off weave in your ends and enjoy your new mitts crossing paths mitts - february 2021 5 thank you so much for making my pattern please tag me @taralovescrochet on instagram and use the hashtags #tlccrossingpathsmitts and #taralovescrochet visit my instagram page here https //www instagram com/taralovescrochet/ for more patterns check out my ravelry store https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/tara-briggs- ravelry-store _________________________________________________ here are some photos from my amazing testers check them out on instagram too @the_mountain_maker @cloud_design_crochet @the_bananapus @handmadebyjadenb @mamankay_crochet @thecoffeeshopcrochet crossing paths mitts - february 2021 6
